database.name: VIEW C_PROJECTPROPOSAL_V
database.view: SELECT p.datesend AS fromdatesend, p.datesend AS todatesend, p.ad_client_id, p.ad_org_id, p.ad_user_id, p.c_bpartner_id, p.c_bpartner_location_id, p.c_project_id, p.c_projectproposal_id, p.issotrx, u.firstname, u.lastname, p.datesend, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby FROM c_projectproposal p, ad_user u, c_project pr WHERE p.ad_user_id = u.ad_user_id AND p.c_project_id = pr.c_project_id AND p.isactive = 'Y' AND pr.isactive = 'Y'
